content: I've already had some experience with partnering with organizations for charity events, having volunteered at a charity gala organized by the Red Cross at the downtown Marriott hotel a week before the "Run for a Cause" marathon. We raised over $10,000 that night, mostly from the auction and ticket sales. For this charity run, I'm thinking of reaching out to the local cancer society to propose a partnership. Can you provide me with some examples of joint marketing efforts we could discuss with them?
